description:
• Enroll in this course so you regain your mojo and get back on track financially!
  • Enroll in this course so you can gain financial independence!
  • Enroll in this course so you can own a home, regardless of your credit score or lack of employment!
  • Enroll in this course so you can learn about the best way to purchase a vehicle and what I believe is the best price point to stay between, and why!
  • Enroll in this course so you can discover the benefits of passive income!
  • Enroll in this course so you can more-or-less enjoy watching me make money!
  • Enroll in this course so you can model what I do so you can achieve the same!
  • Enroll in this course so you can start over and quickly reach a wealthy lifestyle!
Taught from a practical, hands-on approach, I show you exactly what I do and how I do! This course is primarily video lecture, taught using a whiteboard to illustrate key points, and relay critical resources and information to the student. In this course, students will be able to follow along, week-to-week, as I assume the role of someone without any money, any resources, or any credit, while buying a home, a vehicle, and passive residual income. I teach it all! Join me!
title: How I Create Wealth
